statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_segments;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_count, last_interaction_date FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE interaction_count > 5;
SELECT customer_name, last_interaction_date FROM customer_segments ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_count FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_count FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, last_interaction_date FROM customer_segments WHERE interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_segments WHERE interaction_count BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customer_segments WHERE last_interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, interaction_count FROM customer_segments WHERE interaction_count < 3 OR interaction_count > 8 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 10;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT cluster_name FROM clusters ORDER BY cluster_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT cluster_name FROM clusters ORDER BY cluster_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, interaction_count, last_interaction_date FROM customers WHERE interaction_count <= 10 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, registration_date FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT cluster_name, COUNT(customer_id) as customer_count FROM clusters GROUP BY cluster_name HAVING customer_count > 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE customers.name='John Smith' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;

SELECT customers.name, interactions.interaction_type, clusters.cluster_name FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id JOIN clusters ON customers.customer_id = clusters.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id=1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT DISTINCT customers.name, clusters.cluster_name FROM customers JOIN clusters ON customers.customer_id = clusters.customer_id ORDER BY customers.name ASC, clusters.cluster_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, cluster_id FROM customers WHERE cluster_id = 2;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT cluster_id, cluster_name FROM clusters WHERE cluster_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE cluster_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, cluster_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customers.customer_name, clusters.cluster_name FROM customers, clusters WHERE customers.cluster_id = clusters.cluster_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, cluster_id FROM customers WHERE cluster_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_visits ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT c.name, COUNT(w.visit_id) AS num_visits FROM customers c JOIN website_visits w ON c.customer_id = w.customer_id GROUP BY c.name;
SELECT p.product_id, p.interaction_type, c.cluster_name FROM products_interactions p JOIN clusters c ON p.customer_id = c.cluster_id;
SELECT ca.customer_id, cl.cluster_name, ca.assignment_date FROM cluster_assignments ca JOIN clusters cl ON ca.cluster_id = cl.cluster_id WHERE ca.assignment_date > '2021-01-01';
